scripts.start: HEROKU=true NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace server start
scripts.build: HEROKU=true yarn workspace lib build && NODE_ENV=production yarn workspace server build
scripts.prod: NODE_ENV=production concurrently "yarn workspace server start" "yarn workspace client start"
scripts.dev: yarn install && docker compose up --wait && concurrently "yarn workspace server dev" "yarn workspace client dev" "yarn workspace lib dev"
scripts.test: yarn workspace server test && yarn workspace client test
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules workspaces/*/node_modules package-lock.json yarn.lock workspaces/*/build workspaces/*/dist
